articles.title: Guardians move Sunday game due to weather - WJW FOX 8 News Cleveland
articles.description: The Cleveland Guardians’ Saturday game is currently going on as planned, but the team announced Sunday’s game against the Houston Astros has been moved to an earlier time due to forecasted rain.
